Good luck getting out of Silver if you want to play competitive. Prime or not.

If you aim to have good skins and care about reselling them, you better know people irl you know that want one and are willing to buy, or you better be able to deal with selling them at a loss or getting scammed. Otherwise, ignore skins or the hype of "woah, i should get skins cause they're so ePiC and i can just resell them". Speaking from experience. This community is the best place to find materialistic douchebags and people playing for what the game is (which are the type of people i respect).
